job_details.Functieomschrijving:
* Gross monthly salary between EUR 4,292 and EUR 6,131 (scale 09) for a 36 hour week
     * Thirteenth month's salary and 8% holiday allowance
     * 11% Employee Benefit Budget
     * EUR 1,400 development budget per year
     * Hybrid working: balance between home and office work (possible for most roles)
     * A pension, for which you can set the maximum amount of your personal contribution

   View all our benefits.

   We are looking for a talented and enthusiastic Pega Developer to join our team and work on GenAI topics related to Case Management. In this role, you will have the opportunity to shape the future of our case management processes by integrating advanced AI capabilities into our Pega platform. You will collaborate with cross-functional teams to design, develop, and implement innovative solutions that enhance efficiency, accuracy, and user experience.

   You and your responsibilities
     * Develop and maintain Pega applications with a focus on GenAI capabilities.
     * Design and implement AI-driven case management solutions to streamline workflows and improve decision-making.
     * Collaborate with business analysts, data scientists, and other stakeholders to understand requirements and deliver high-quality solutions.
     * Stay up-to-date with the latest advancements in Pega and AI technologies and apply them to enhance our systems.
     * Ensure compliance with regulatory standards and best practices in financial crime prevention.

   You and your team

   The Financial Economic Crime (FEC) department at Rabobank plays a crucial role in safeguarding the integrity of the financial system. Our team is dedicated to preventing and combating financial crimes such as money laundering, fraud, and terrorist financing. We leverage cutting-edge technology and innovative solutions to stay ahead of emerging threats and ensure compliance with regulatory requirements.
job_details.full_text:
Pega Developer - GenAI Case Management

* Gross monthly salary between EUR 4,292 and EUR 6,131 (scale 09) for a 36 hour week
     * Thirteenth month's salary and 8% holiday allowance
     * 11% Employee Benefit Budget
     * EUR 1,400 development budget per year
     * Hybrid working: balance between home and office work (possible for most roles)
     * A pension, for which you can set the maximum amount of your personal contribution

   View all our benefits.

   We are looking for a talented and enthusiastic Pega Developer to join our team and work on GenAI topics related to Case Management. In this role, you will have the opportunity to shape the future of our case management processes by integrating advanced AI capabilities into our Pega platform. You will collaborate with cross-functional teams to design, develop, and implement innovative solutions that enhance efficiency, accuracy, and user experience.

   You and your responsibilities
     * Develop and maintain Pega applications with a focus on GenAI capabilities.
     * Design and implement AI-driven case management solutions to streamline workflows and improve decision-making.
     * Collaborate with business analysts, data scientists, and other stakeholders to understand requirements and deliver high-quality solutions.
     * Stay up-to-date with the latest advancements in Pega and AI technologies and apply them to enhance our systems.
     * Ensure compliance with regulatory standards and best practices in financial crime prevention.

   You and your team

   The Financial Economic Crime (FEC) department at Rabobank plays a crucial role in safeguarding the integrity of the financial system. Our team is dedicated to preventing and combating financial crimes such as money laundering, fraud, and terrorist financing. We leverage cutting-edge technology and innovative solutions to stay ahead of emerging threats and ensure compliance with regulatory requirements.

job_profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on Pega platform development and business process management, with only a mention of integrating GenAI capabilities. It lacks the depth in core AI/ML tasks, specific generative model development, or MLOps required for an ML or GenAI Engineer profile. The role appears to be primarily a Pega Developer role with an AI component rather than a dedicated AI engineering role.

job_tasks.phrase: integrate advanced AI capabilities into our Pega platform
job_tasks.justification: This phrase indicates the integration and application of AI capabilities, which falls under the modeling aspect, even if the specifics of model development are not detailed.

job_tasks.phrase: enhance efficiency, accuracy, and user experience
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the business outcomes and goals that the technical solutions are intended to achieve, aligning with understanding business needs.

job_tasks.phrase: Develop and maintain Pega applications with a focus on GenAI capabilities.
job_tasks.justification: This involves developing and maintaining applications, which is a core software development task, with a specific focus on GenAI features.

job_tasks.phrase: Design and implement AI-driven case management solutions to streamline workflows and improve decision-making.
job_tasks.justification: This involves designing and implementing solutions driven by AI, which relates to applying modeling techniques to solve specific problems.

job_tasks.phrase: Collaborate with business analysts, data scientists, and other stakeholders to understand requirements and deliver high-quality solutions.
job_tasks.justification: This explicitly mentions collaboration with various stakeholders to understand requirements, which is a key aspect of communication and collaboration.

job_tasks.phrase: Stay up-to-date with the latest advancements in Pega and AI technologies and apply them to enhance our systems.
job_tasks.justification: This highlights the need to continuously learn and adapt to new technologies in a rapidly evolving field.

job_tasks.phrase: Ensure compliance with regulatory standards and best practices in financial crime prevention.
job_tasks.justification: This task involves understanding and adhering to specific business domain requirements and regulations, linking technical work to business context.

job_tasks.phrase: safeguarding the integrity of the financial system. Our team is dedicated to preventing and combating financial crimes such as money laundering, fraud, and terrorist financing.
job_tasks.justification: This describes the core business domain and its objectives, which the role must understand to be effective.

technologies.justification: Pega is a platform for business process management and low-code application development, often used for complex enterprise solutions. It's not a standard ML/AI modeling library but a platform where AI can be integrated.
This refers to Generative Artificial Intelligence, a broad category of AI models.

soft_skills.phrase: Collaborate with business analysts, data scientists, and other stakeholders to understand requirements and deliver high-quality solutions.
soft_skills.justification: This directly describes the need for effective communication and collaboration with diverse teams and stakeholders.

soft_skills.phrase: Stay up-to-date with the latest advancements in Pega and AI technologies and apply them to enhance our systems.
soft_skills.justification: This emphasizes the importance of continuous learning and adapting to new technologies in a fast-paced field.
While generic, 'enthusiastic' can imply a proactive and engaged attitude towards the role and its challenges.
